name: Pd-externals
tagline: Everything open source and released under MIT license unless stated.
body:
### What you will find here
A collection of some of the externals I created for Pure Data, source code and binaries.
For now I'm only developing under Windows, but hopefully I'll soon start including the ports and binaries for Linux as well as mac os x.

### Available externals
* seqBang: sequentially output received information through arbitrary number of outlets

### Author
This repository is created and maintained by Alexandre Clément (@Indeterminado)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with any of the externals? Have a great idea for an improvement or a new external? Contact alexandre.r.clement@gmail.com and I’ll get back to you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
